query:
UPDATE floor_levels
SET levelName = CASE
  WHEN levelName LIKE '%Test%Lower%' THEN 'Lower Level'
  WHEN levelName LIKE '%Test%Upper%' THEN 'Upper Level'
  ELSE levelName
END
WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Campbelltown%' LIMIT 1)
